Package game.Items.consumable

Class EstusFlask

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.Items.consumable.Potion
game.Items.consumable.EstusFlask
All Implemented Interfaces:
DesignOSoulsAddOn, Capable, Printable, Resettable
public class EstusFlask extends Potion implements Resettable
A class that represent the healing potion named Estus Flask. it can only be carried by the player.
Version:
1
Author:
Shin Yung Xin

      Description copied from interface: Resettable

      Specified by:
      isExist in interface Resettable
      Returns:
